statements: SELECT * FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE functional_significance = 'Enhancer';
SELECT element_name, chromosome, start_position FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE chromosome = 'chr1';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryElements ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT id, element_name, functional_significance FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE start_position > 5000;
SELECT id, element_name, sequence FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE sequence IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND start_position > 1000 ORDER BY element_name DESC;

SELECT id, element_name, functional_significance FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE start_position < 5000 AND (functional_significance = 'Enhancer' OR functional_significance = 'Promoter') ORDER BY start_position ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT functional_significance FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE chromosome = '1' OR chromosome = '2';
SELECT element_name, sequence, start_position FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE end_position - start_position > 100 ORDER BY end_position DESC, sequence ASC;
SELECT id, element_name, sequence, functional_significance FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE functional_significance = 'Enhancer-Promoter' AND element_name LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements ORDER BY element_name ASC;
SELECT element_id, element_name, element_type FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type = 'enhancer';
SELECT significance_id, significance_description FROM functional_significance WHERE significance_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements WHERE start_position BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT element_id, element_name, start_position, end_position FROM regulatory_elements ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type = 'Promoter' ORDER BY element_id DESC;
SELECT element_name, start_position FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type = 'Enhancer' ORDER BY element_id ASC;
SELECT element_name, end_position FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type = 'Enhancer' AND element_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;

SELECT regulatory_elements.element_name, functional_significance.significance_description FROM regulatory_elements INNER JOIN functional_significance ON regulatory_elements.element_id = functional_significance.element_id WHERE regulatory_elements.element_type = 'Enhancer';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type = 'Promoter' AND start_position < 500 ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryElements;
SELECT id, sequence, element_type FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE element_type = 'enhancer';
SELECT factor_name, factor_type FROM RegulatoryFactors ORDER BY factor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryInteractions WHERE regulatory_element_id = 3;
SELECT factor_name, factor_activity FROM RegulatoryFactors WHERE factor_activity = 'active' ORDER BY factor_name;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryElements;
SELECT id, element_type FROM RegulatoryElements WHERE significance IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryFactors WHERE factor_type = 'Inhibitor';

SELECT r.element_type, f.factor_name, i.interaction_type FROM RegulatoryElements r INNER JOIN RegulatoryInteractions i ON r.id = i.regulatory_element_id INNER JOIN RegulatoryFactors f ON i.regulatory_factor_id = f.id;

SELECT r.sequence, f.factor_type FROM RegulatoryElements r LEFT JOIN RegulatoryInteractions i ON r.id = i.regulatory_element_id LEFT JOIN RegulatoryFactors f ON i.regulatory_factor_id = f.id ORDER BY r.id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements;
SELECT element_id, element_name, element_type FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type = 'promoter';
SELECT function_id, function_name FROM regulatory_functions WHERE function_description LIKE '%binding%';
SELECT element_name, sequence FROM regulatory_elements ORDER BY element_id DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome FROM gene_information WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type='Promoter';
SELECT element_name, sequence FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_type='Enhancer' ORDER BY element_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT element_type FROM regulatory_elements WHERE length(sequence) > 50;

SELECT element_name, function_name FROM regulatory_elements JOIN regulatory_element_function_mapping ON regulatory_elements.element_id = regulatory_element_function_mapping.element_id JOIN regulatory_functions ON regulatory_element_function_mapping.function_id = regulatory_functions.function_id;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome FROM gene_information WHERE chromosome='X' OR chromosome='Y' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements;
SELECT id, element_name, location FROM regulatory_elements WHERE location = 'promoter';
SELECT id, element_name, location FROM regulatory_elements ORDER BY element_name DESC;
SELECT id, element_name, sequence FROM regulatory_elements WHERE element_name LIKE '%enhancer%';
SELECT r.element_name, a.function FROM regulatory_elements r INNER JOIN regulatory_annotations a ON r.id = a.regulatory_element_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_elements WHERE location = 'Promoter' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT element_name, location, length(sequence) FROM regulatory_elements WHERE length(sequence) > 50 LIMIT 10;
SELECT r.element_name, f.significance, f.strength FROM regulatory_elements r INNER JOIN functional_significance f ON r.id = f.regulatory_element_id WHERE f.strength > 0.5;
SELECT MAX(length(sequence)) AS max_sequence_length FROM regulatory_elements;
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.element_name FROM user_profiles u LEFT JOIN regulatory_elements r ON u.id = r.id WHERE u.email LIKE '%@example.com%';
